title: Champ Select Issue
body: Is anyone else having issues choosing champions and runes/masteries in champ select? Quite often i find myself in champ select and i click on a champion to lock in and it doesn't load resulting in my lobby breaking. I have had it happen a few times with summoner spells and runes/masteries as well and I'm finding it irritating. I have fiber, Ethernet cable and a custom built pc that I know can handle normal lag and performance issues reducing them to a minimum but this just seems to far out of character to be anything on my end. Thinking might be a Alpha Client bug and wondering if anyone else has the same issue.

replies.body: I think it is the client itself, it should be fixed when the beta comes out. I have had it a few times when the client wouldn't let me pick my champ.
